name: Rex-Bac-T Bacterial Urinal Screen (UB-CS)
description: Rex-Bac-T Bacterial Urinal Screen (UB-CS) fragrant deodorizer enzyme and bacteria block cleans and deodorizes and prevents scale buildup. Our eco-friendly healthy bacteria formulation continuously eliminates odors and maintains drain lines. Lasts up to 1,500 flushes. Does not contain harmful acids or para-dichlorobenzene.
